statements: SELECT * FROM enzymes_and_catalysts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, type FROM enzymes_and_catalysts WHERE supplier = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM enzymes_and_catalysts ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM enzymes_and_catalysts WHERE type = 'DNA Ligase' AND quantity > 100;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM enzymes_and_catalysts WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM enzymes_and_catalysts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, type, supplier FROM enzymes_and_catalysts WHERE type='enzyme' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM enzymes_and_catalysts WHERE supplier='ABC Inc' AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT * FROM enzymes_and_catalysts ORDER BY type DESC, id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, name, type, quantity, expiration_date FROM enzymes_and_catalysts WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-06-01' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Enzymes;
SELECT enzyme_name, storage_temperature FROM Enzymes WHERE storage_temperature > 25;
SELECT enzyme_name, supplier FROM Enzymes ORDER BY supplier DESC;
SELECT enzyme_name, supplier, storage_temperature FROM Enzymes WHERE supplier = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT catalyst_name, purity FROM Catalysts WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY purity ASC;
SELECT enzyme_name, storage_temperature FROM Enzymes WHERE supplier = 'Acme Chemicals'
SELECT * FROM Catalysts WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY purity DESC
SELECT enzyme_name, storage_temperature FROM Enzymes WHERE storage_temperature < 0 ORDER BY storage_temperature
SELECT enzyme_name, COUNT(*) AS enzyme_count FROM Enzymes GROUP BY enzyme_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM Catalysts WHERE purity BETWEEN 95 AND 99 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Enzymes;
SELECT id, name, category FROM Catalysts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, item_name, location FROM Inventory WHERE unit = 'pcs';
SELECT name, manufacturer, category FROM Enzymes WHERE category = 'Protease';
SELECT * FROM Enzymes WHERE category = 'DNA' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM Enzymes WHERE manufacturer = 'CompanyA' AND storage_conditions LIKE '%room temperature%';
SELECT id, name, role FROM Catalysts WHERE type = 'Metallic' ORDER BY id ASC, name;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Catalysts WHERE vendor = 'SupplierB' AND role IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Enzymes;
SELECT enzyme_name, manufacturer FROM Enzymes WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Catalysts ORDER BY catalyst_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT transaction_id, date, type, quantity, item_name FROM Transactions JOIN Inventory ON Transactions.item_id = Inventory.inventory_id;
SELECT * FROM Enzymes WHERE enzyme_id = 1;
SELECT enzyme_name, quantity FROM Enzymes ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, type, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.date, i.item_name, i.quantity FROM Transactions t JOIN Inventory i ON t.item_id = i.inventory_id WHERE t.type = 'purchase';
SELECT e.enzyme_name, c.catalyst_name, i.item_name FROM Enzymes e, Catalysts c, Inventory i WHERE e.quantity > 0 AND c.quantity > 0 AND i.quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Enzymes;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Catalysts WHERE type='Organic';
SELECT supplier, type FROM Catalysts WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM Enzymes GROUP BY supplier;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Users.name, Suppliers.location FROM Orders, Users, Suppliers WHERE Orders.user_id = Users.user_id AND Orders.catalyst_id = Suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Enzymes WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, type, supplier FROM Catalysts WHERE type = 'Metal' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY supplier DESC
SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.quantity, Users.name FROM Orders INNER JOIN Users ON Orders.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE Orders.quantity > 10 AND Users.name LIKE '%John%'

SELECT E.name AS enzyme_name, C.name AS catalyst_name, O.order_date FROM Orders O LEFT JOIN Enzymes E ON O.enzyme_id = E.id LEFT JOIN Catalysts C ON O.catalyst_id = C.id WHERE O.order_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT S.name AS supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers S JOIN Orders O ON S.supplier_id = (SELECT E.supplier FROM Enzymes E WHERE E.id = O.enzyme_id) GROUP BY S.name HAVING total_orders > 5
